verses.verse: Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3303>verily<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> covenant <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1345>ordinances<s%> of divine <S%G2999>service,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> a <S%G2886>worldly<s%> <S%G39>sanctuary.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> there was a <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> <S%G2680>made;<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4413>first,<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G5037>the<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3087>candlestick,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5132>table,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4286>shewbread;<s%> <S%G740><s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G39>sanctuary.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2665>veil,<s%> the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> which is <S%G3004>called<s%> the holiest of <S%G39>all;<s%> <S%G39><s%>

Which <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2369>censer,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2787>ark<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G4028>overlaid<s%> round <S%G3840>about<s%> with <S%G5552>gold,<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> was the <S%G5553>golden<s%> <S%G4713>pot<s%> that <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3131>manna,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2>Aaron's<s%> <S%G4464>rod<s%> that <S%G985>budded,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4109>tables<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1242>covenant;<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5231>over<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> the <S%G5502>cherubim<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2683>shadowing<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> mercy <S%G2435>seat;<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2076>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G2596>particularly.<s%> <S%G3313><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when these <S%G5130>things<s%> were <S%G3779>thus<s%> <S%G2680>ordained,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%> <S%G1524>went<s%> <S%G1275>always<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacle,<s%> <S%G2005>accomplishing<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2999>service<s%> of God.

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1213>signifying,<s%> that <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%> into <S%G3588>the<s%> holiest of <S%G39>all<s%> was not <S%G3380>yet<s%> made <S%G5319>manifest,<s%> while as <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> <S%G2192>was<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> standing: <S%G4714><s%>

Which stood <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G1033>meats<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4188>drinks,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1313>divers<s%> <S%G909>washings,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4561>carnal<s%> <S%G1345>ordinances,<s%> <S%G1945>imposed<s%> on them <S%G3360>until<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%> of <S%G1357>reformation.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> being <S%G3854>come<s%> a high <S%G749>priest<s%> of good <S%G18>things<s%> to <S%G3195>come,<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> a <S%G3187>greater<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> more <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacle,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> made with <S%G5499>hands,<s%> that is to <S%G5123>say,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G2937>building;<s%>

Neither <S%G3761><s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5131>goats<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3448>calves,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> he entered <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G2178>once<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> holy <S%G39>place,<s%> having <S%G2147>obtained<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G3085>redemption<s%> for us.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5022>bulls<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G5131>goats,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4700>ashes<s%> of a <S%G1151>heifer<s%> <S%G4472>sprinkling<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2840>unclean,<s%> <S%G37>sanctifieth<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2514>purifying<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> flesh: <S%G4561><s%>

How <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> shall <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G4374>offered<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> without <S%G299>spot<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2511>purge<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> to <S%G3000>serve<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God?<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> for this <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G5124><s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3316>mediator<s%> of the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>testament,<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> by means of <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G629>redemption<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3847>transgressions<s%> that were <S%G1909>under<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1242>testament,<s%> they which are <S%G2564>called<s%> might <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2817>inheritance.<s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> a <S%G1242>testament<s%> is, there must also of <S%G318>necessity<s%> <S%G5342>be<s%> the <S%G2288>death<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1303>testator.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> a <S%G1242>testament<s%> is of <S%G949>force<s%> after men are <S%G1909>dead:<s%> <S%G3498><s%> <S%G1893>otherwise<s%> it is of no strength at <S%G2480>all<s%> <S%G3379><s%> <S%G3753>while<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1303>testator<s%> <S%G2198>liveth.<s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5124>This<s%> is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1242>testament<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G1781>enjoined<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>

Moreover <S%G3668><s%> he <S%G4472>sprinkled<s%> with <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G1161>both<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacle,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3009>ministry.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4975>almost<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2511>purged<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G129>blood;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> shedding of <S%G130>blood<s%> <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G859>remission.<s%>

It was <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G318>necessary<s%> that <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G5262>patterns<s%> of <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>heavens<s%> should be <S%G2511>purified<s%> with <S%G5125>these;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> heavenly <S%G2032>things<s%> <S%G846>themselves<s%> with <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G5025>these.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the holy <S%G39>places<s%> made with <S%G5499>hands,<s%> which are the <S%G499>figures<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G228>true;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G846>itself,<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> to <S%G1718>appear<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4383>presence<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> us: <S%G2257><s%>

Nor <S%G3761><s%> yet <S%G2443>that<s%> he should <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G4178>often,<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G1525>entereth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> holy <S%G39>place<s%> every <S%G2596>year<s%> <S%G1763><s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G245>others;<s%>

For <S%G1893>then<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G4178>often<s%> have <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G4930>end<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G165>world<s%> hath he <S%G5319>appeared<s%> to put <S%G1519>away<s%> <S%G115><s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> of <S%G848>himself.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2596>as<s%> <S%G3745><s%> it is <S%G606>appointed<s%> unto <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> to <S%G599>die,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> the judgment: <S%G2920><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> was <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G4374>offered<s%> to <S%G399>bear<s%> the <S%G266>sins<s%> of <S%G4183>many;<s%> and unto them that look <S%G553>for<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> shall he <S%G3700>appear<s%> <S%G1537>the<s%> second <S%G1208>time<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>
